name: Garlic Potato Spinach Stir fry ( Lasooni Aloo Palak)
description: Garlic Potato Spinach Stir fry - Lasooni Aloo Palak. Potato Spinach curry with garlic and Indian spices. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp coriander seeds or mustard seeds
3  medium potatoes (, peeled and cubed (white or yukon gold))
cayenne or pepper flakes for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil over medium heat. Add seeds and cook until well toasted. (For oil free, dry roast the seeds over medium heat until fragrant, then add 2 tbsp water or broth and proceed. )
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil over medium heat. Add seeds and cook until well toasted. (For oil free, dry roast the seeds over medium heat until fragrant, then add 2 tbsp water or broth and proceed. )

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chili and garlic and reduce heat to medium low. Cook until golden, you can also add in 1/4 cup cooked onion here.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chili and garlic and reduce heat to medium low. Cook until golden, you can also add in 1/4 cup cooked onion here.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the turmeric and paprika and mix in. Add the potatoes and toss well for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the turmeric and paprika and mix in. Add the potatoes and toss well for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes, cilantro, salt and 1 cup water. Mix well, cover and cook for 12 to 14 mins or until potatoes are tender.( You can add some cooked chickpeas at this point to make it into a meal)
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes, cilantro, salt and 1 cup water. Mix well, cover and cook for 12 to 14 mins or until potatoes are tender.( You can add some cooked chickpeas at this point to make it into a meal)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spinach in 2 batches, cover and wilt. then mix in, add a dash of salt and cover and cook for another minute. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. You can also add in some garam masala or curry powder
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spinach in 2 batches, cover and wilt. then mix in, add a dash of salt and cover and cook for another minute. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. You can also add in some garam masala or curry powder

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with flatbread or rice.Store: Refrigerate for upto 3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with flatbread or rice.Store: Refrigerate for upto 3 days.
